title: Old Reginald Denny is beating the picture, spreading the urge of drivers to flee the demonstrators.
subtitle: This article uses a 24-year-old photo of riots in Los Angeles to mock modern-day protests on the subject of black life.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: An old picture of the truck driver (Reginald Denny) defends that drivers do not stop for protestors on the roads.
